subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Michelle Wie began her career as something of a novelty. But on the day before the Sybase Classic, the former child prodigy had few regrets about how she made her way to L.P.G.A tour.
snippet: Michelle Wie began her career as something of a novelty. But on the day before the Sybase Classic, the former child prodigy had few regrets about how she made her way to L.P.G.A tour.
